attributes.action: enforce the broadcast by terrestrial television of all competitive Home Nation football matches.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a disgrace that we are unable to watch our national team playing our national game without paying a further television subscription. I propose that this situation should be reversed with legislation to guarantee that ALL COMPETITIVE HOME NATION FOOTBALL MATCHES ARE AVAILABLE FOR EVERYONE TO WATCH on terrestrial television by virtue of paying the licence fee.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
